job.description:
This role is 100% remote!
This Jobot Job is hosted by Kyle Shaw
Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button and sending us your resume.
Salary $150,000 - $180,000 per year
A Bit About Us
We are one of the largest companies in entertainment. We provide fun to the whole family with our theme parks and other attractions, and are looking for a SRE to join our adtech team that's working with the latest in technology to build an innovative platform that allows our brand to reach a larger and wider audience.
Why join us?
This role is 100% remote with competitive base salary, bonus, generous PTO, and great health benefits. We are a collaborative team looking for a senior engineer who enjoys bringing new ideals to the table and wants to make take ownership of several key parts of our infrastructure.
Job Details
This role is heavily involved with automation and containerization efforts for an adtech platform. We are looking for someone well-versed in Kubernetes and writing Infrastructure as Code to build out cloud environments.
5+ years of professional SRE / DevOps engineering experience
3+ years experience creating containers, specifically with Kubernetes (EKS, GKE, AKS, etc)
Experience standing up CI/CD pipelines, preferably with Azure DevOps, Git, or related tools
Capable of writing Infrastructure as Code with Terraform or Cloudformation
Proficient with AWS and related AWS packages (ECS, S3, Lambdas, etc)
BS in Computer Science or related field
Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button.
